overview.tax_residency_rules: Determined by physical presence test (residing in South Africa for more than 183 days in a tax year).
overview.tax_filing_frequency: Individuals: Annually; Companies: 12 months from year-end.

personal_income_tax.foreign_income_taxed: Yes, for residents. If source country has a DTA with South Africa, foreign income may be exempt.
personal_income_tax.exemptions: R87,300 for individuals under 65 years, R116,900 for individuals 65-74 years, and R127,400 for individuals over 75 years.
personal_income_tax.social_security: Unemployment Insurance Fund (UIF): 1% of salary (shared between employer and employee); Pension contributions: Up to 27.5% of salary tax-deductible.

corporate_tax.foreign_income_taxed: Yes, for residents. If source country has a DTA with South Africa, foreign income may be exempt.

withholding_taxes.dividends: 20% (10% for dividends paid to non-residents under a DTA).
withholding_taxes.interest: 15% (interest paid to non-residents exempt from withholding tax under DTA).
